active_incidents.title: Some users may be experiencing trouble with canvas.

notes.body:
Users should no longer be experiencing any trouble using canvas. 

Apologies for the trouble today and thank you for your patience.

A small number of users may be experiencing trouble loading, editing or saving changes made to canvas. 

Weâ€™re investigating and will let you know as soon as we know more. 

We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
